name: Improved Stonecunning
description: Your sense for stonework is uncanny.
benefit: You receive a +4 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework. This bonus replaces the stonecunning abilityâ€™s normal bonus on Perception checks.
mythicDescription: If you listen close, you can hear the secrets of stone.
mythicBenefit: You gain stone tell as a spell-like ability usable once per day with a caster level equal to twice your tier.
